plugin-type.title: extraction
plugin-type.description: Extraction plugins are responsible for extracting credentials from the request.

plugin-type.title: authentication
plugin-type.description: Authentication plugins are responsible for validating credentials generated by the Extraction Plugin.

plugin-type.title: challenge
plugin-type.description: Challenge plugins initiate a challenge to the user to provide credentials.

plugin-type.title: update credentials
plugin-type.description: Credential update plugins respond to the user changing credentials.

plugin-type.title: reset credentials
plugin-type.description: Credential clear plugins respond to a user logging out.

plugin-type.title: properties
plugin-type.description: Properties plugins generate property sheets for users.

plugin-type.title: groups
plugin-type.description: Groups plugins determine the groups to which a user belongs.

plugin-type.title: roles
plugin-type.description: Roles plugins determine the global roles which a user has.

plugin-type.title: update
plugin-type.description: Update plugins allow the user or the application to update the user's properties.

plugin-type.title: validation
plugin-type.description: Validation plugins specify allowable values for user properties (e.g., minimum password length, allowed characters, etc.)

plugin-type.title: user_enumeration
plugin-type.description: Enumeration plugins allow querying users by ID, and searching for users who match particular criteria.

plugin-type.title: user_adder
plugin-type.description: User Adder plugins allow the Pluggable Auth Service to create users.

plugin-type.title: group_enumeration
plugin-type.description: Enumeration plugins allow querying groups by ID.

plugin-type.title: role_enumeration
plugin-type.description: Enumeration plugins allow querying roles by ID.

plugin-type.title: role_assigner
plugin-type.description: Role Assigner plugins allow the Pluggable Auth Service to assign roles to principals.

plugin-type.title: challenge_protocol_chooser
plugin-type.description: Challenge Protocol Chooser plugins decide what authorizationprotocol to use for a given request type.

plugin-type.title: request_type_sniffer
plugin-type.description: Request Type Sniffer plugins detect the type of an incoming request.
